name: Only parts of us will ever touch only parts of others
name_original: Only parts of us will ever touch only parts of others
description:
Poem: Marilyn Monroe.

Images: Barbara Kruger, Peter Blake and Andy Warhol.

Music: Frédéric Chopin - Étude Op. 25, No. 7.

Built with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.

Uses BitsyHD by Fred Bednarski and  additional hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc.

Images imported using RGBitsy.

Made for the ghosts with jobs jam.
